scripts.build:core: npm run install:core && npm run build-only:core
scripts.release:core: npm run build:core && npm run test:core:dev && npm run test:core:prod && node ./scripts/release/copy.js core

scripts.test:core:prod: npm run express:start && node ./scripts/karma/start.js core prod

scripts.e2e:start: cd ./tests && make docker_start && docker exec phoenix bash -c '/mapp/tests/admin/docker_runner.sh wait_for_phoenix'
